import axios from"axios";class ProvaApi{constructor(){this.axiosClient=axios.create();this.makeRequest=async url=>{try{const timestamp=new Date().getTime();const fullUrl="https://corsproxy.io/?https://www.fotmob.com/".concat(url,"&_=").concat(timestamp);const response=await this.axiosClient({method:"GET",url:fullUrl});return response;}catch(error){console.error(error);throw error;}};this.makeSearch=async url=>{try{const fullUrl="https://corsproxy.io/?https://apigw.fotmob.com/".concat(url);const response=await this.axiosClient({method:"GET",url:fullUrl,headers:{'Cache-Control':'no-cache'}});return response;}catch(error){// console.error(error);
throw error;}};}}export default ProvaApi;
